about_the_game: God of Y is an epic RPG that puts players in the role of a chosen god, searching for the true power of the “God of Y” in a world where chaos and order are intertwined. The game combines open-world exploration, a dynamic quest system, and in-depth combat mechanics, allowing players to freely choose their growth paths, unlock divine skill trees, and utilize powerful divine magic in battle against their fated enemies. The game utilizes a turn-based combat system combined with tactical decision-making to make every battle challenging. The player's choices will influence the world and determine whether to seal or inherit the power of the “God of Y”.

The game utilizes a turn-based combat system combined with tactical decision-making to make every battle challenging. The player's choices will influence the world and determine whether to seal or inherit the power of the “God of Y”.
name: god of Y

Minimum:
